title: Two schoolgirls reported dead after drowning
content: Two girls who were bathing at Vilbawa Wewa in Kurunegala last evening (February 15) have died after drowning.The deceased children, aged 13 and 14 years, hailed from Kurunegala area.According to reports, the residents of the area had rescued four schoolgirls who drowned while bathing at the Vilbawa Wewa.
